label: 花園天皇
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This sovereign (r. 1308-1318) of the 持明院統 Jimyō'in-tō line of emperors. Well-read in Chinese and Japanese classics, Hanazono compiled a poetry collection and wrote the lengthy diary 花園天皇宸記 Hanazono tennō shinki.
